## Comparable Company Method: Unlever and Relever Beta A comparable firm has **β = 1.03**, **D/E = 0.33**, **tax = 23**%. **(a)** Compute the **unlevered beta** for the business. ::: {.question-block}
✅ **Step 1 (remove leverage):** βU = βL / [1 + (1 − T) × (D/E)] → business-only risk. **Your numbers:** 1.03 / [1 + (1 − 0.23) × 0.33] = **0.82**.
::: **(b)** Your **target firm** will finance the project at **D/E = 0.68**. Compute the **relevered beta** to be used in CAPM. ::: {.question-block}
✅ **Step 2 (apply target leverage):** βL = βU × [1 + (1 − T) × (D/E)]. **Your numbers:** 0.8213 × [1 + (1 − 0.23) × 0.68] = **1.25**. This aligns the project’s risk with **your capital structure**.
:::
